summary: A container for 3‑dimensional keypoint coordinates that supports both single (N×3) and batched (B×N×3) representations, providing indexing, cloning, conversion to and from tensors, shape inspection, padding/unpadding, and geometric transformations.
business_intent: Enables robust handling of 3D keypoint data in computer‑vision and graphics pipelines such as pose estimation, object tracking, and 3D reconstruction, ensuring consistent tensor formats and offering preprocessing utilities.
